description: {"blocks":[{"key":"192ht","text":"Droplet microfluidics-based single-cell combinatorial indexing sequencing represents an attractive way to balance cost, scalability,\nrobustness, and accessibility. However, current methods need a tailored protocol for specific modality respectively, which may limit their potential for automation. We introduce UDA-seq, universal droplet microfluidics-based combinatorial indexing for massive-scale single-cell multimodal sequencing. We demonstrate that when necessary, UDA-seq enables effectively generating more than 100,000 single-cell data in a single-channel experiment of droplet microfluidics. Meanwhile, UDA-seq provides a universal workflow for\naccomplishing several multimodal tasks, including single-cell co-assay of RNA and VDJ, RNA and ATAC, and RNA and CRISPR guide RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: the Strategic Priority Research Program of the Chinese Academy of Sciences

the National funded postdoctoral researcher program

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5hjbk","text":"    Prepare Master Mix \u0026 Load Chromium Next GEM Chip K","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dj1bg","text":"A certain number of cells or nuclei were added to Master Mix (18.8ul RT Reagent B (2000165); 7.3ul 1.1ul Template Switch Oligo (3000228); 1.9ul Reducing Agent B (2000087) and 8.3ul RT Enzyme C(2000085/2000102) each sample).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bvdbs","text":"The microfluidic Chromium Next GEM Chip K (2000182) was loaded with 70 µl of cells or nuclei in thermoligation mix (inlet 1), 50 µl of Single Cell VDJ 5' Gel Bead (inlet 2, 10x Genomics catalog no. 1000264/1000267) and 45 µl of Partitioning Oil (inlet 3, 10x Genomics catalog no. 2000190) and run on the Chromium system.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d075","text":"The PCR mix was incubate in a thermomixer to perform enrichment PCR as follows: 53˚C for 45min, 4˚C hold.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ehcel","text":"Prepare linear amplification mix(2X KAPA HiFi HotStart Ready Mix; 0.5uM Truseq-i5 index primer; 0.5uM Partial TSO/IS and 0.5uM P5 primer).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1ueqp","text":"Pipette 10X to mix thoroughly. Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49mjr","text":"PCR mix was incubate in a thermomixer to perform enrichment PCR as follows: 98˚C for 45s , and then 14 cycles of [ 98˚C for 20s, 63 °C for 30s, 72˚C for 1min]; 72˚C for 1min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b7crr","text":"cDNA PCR product were purified with 0.6x XP beads and elute in 300 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4cgqu","text":"Purified with 0.7x XP beads and elute in 55 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d02iv","text":"50 ng mass of cDNA products (35ul) were mixed with 15 µl of i7-only TN5 Tagmentation Mix(10ul 5x Reaction Buffer (vazyme L buffer) and 5ul Self-i7 TN5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5dkt6","text":"Pipette mix 15x (pipette set to 30 µl) on ice. Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9fm67","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol. 55 ˚C for 10min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ut6s","text":"PCR product were purified with 0.8x XP beads and elute in 40.5 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4f177","text":"GEX Sample Index PCR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dj6nc","text":"Prepare and add Sample Index PCR Mix(NEBNex High-Fidelity 2X PCR Master Mix (NEB#M0541S); 0.5uM Partial P5 and 0.5uM Nextera P7-index). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f6net","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol. 72 ˚C for 5 min, 98 ˚C for 45 s, 8-9 cycles of [98 ˚C for 20 s, 60 ˚C for 30 s, 72 ˚C for 1min], 72 ˚C for 5 min in thermocycler, storage at 4 ˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9nkg9","text":"PCR product were selected size with 0.6-0.8x XP beads and elute in 25.5 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a8evf","text":"VDJ capture 1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cnr3m","text":"Place a tube strip on ice and transfer 5 µl cDNA product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dcpuf","text":"Prepare V(D)J Amplification 1 Reaction Mix(Amp Mix (2000047/2000103); 0.5uM Partial P5 and 0.5uM T/B VDJ outer primer in nuclease-free water) on ice. Vortex and centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rbld","text":"Add 75 µl V(D)J Amplification 1 Reaction Mix to each tube containing 5 µl sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bke1k","text":"Pipette mix 5x (pipette set to 90 µl). Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ao5nm","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol. 98 ˚C for 45 s, 10 cycles for T cells /8 cycles for B cells of [98 ˚C for 20 s, 62 ˚C for 30 s, 72 ˚C for 1min], 72 ˚C for 1 min in thermocycler, storage at 4 ˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f8j0h","text":"Store at 4°C for up to 72 h or proceed to the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ertk","text":"PCR product were selected size with 0.5X-0.8x XP beads and elute in 30.5 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"58k7v","text":"VDJ capture 2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3enh2","text":"Prepare and add 50ul V(D)J Amplification 2 Reaction Mix(Amp Mix (2000047/2000103); 0.5uM Partial P5 and 0.5uM T/B VDJ inner primer) . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"l0nu","text":"Pipette mix 5x (pipette set to 90 µl). Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89lmn","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol. 98 ˚C for 45 s, 8 cycles for T cells /8 cycles for B cells of [98 ˚C for 20 s, 62 ˚C for 30 s, 72 ˚C for 1min], 72 ˚C for 1 min in thermocycler, storage at 4 ˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6trcp","text":"Store at 4°C for up to 72 h or proceed to the next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aj2et","text":"PCR product were selected size with 0.5X-0.8x XP beads and elute in 30.5 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8lhau","text":"50 ng mass of VDJ capture products (35ul) were mixed with 15 µl of i7-only TN5 Tagmentation Mix(10ul 5x Reaction Buffer (vazyme L buffer) and 5ul Self-i7 TN5).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"39f6u","text":"Pipette mix 15x (pipette set to 30 µl) on ice. Centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3tik5","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol. 55 ˚C for 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81kql","text":"PCR product were purified with 0.8x XP beads and elute in 40.5 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7qgqt","text":"GEX Sample Index PCR","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9q72s","text":"Prepare and add Sample Index PCR Mix(NEBNex High-Fidelity 2X PCR Master Mix (NEB#M0541S); 0.5uM Partial P5 and 0.5uM Nextera P7-index). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"45gbm","text":"Incubate in a thermal cycler with the following protocol. 72 ˚C for 5 min, 98 ˚C for 45 s, 8 cycles of [98 ˚C for 20 s, 60 ˚C for 30 s, 72 ˚C for 1min], 72 ˚C for 5 min in thermocycler, storage at 4 ˚C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mseo","text":"PCR product were selected size with 0.8x XP beads and elute in 25.5 ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"264vu","text":"Transfer 17 µl sample to a Pre-Amplification PCR.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ae7ea","text":"Place on the magnet•Low until the solution clears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d5a3","text":"Incubate 1 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f060","text":"Vortex for 15 sec to mix thoroughly. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ovqf","text":"If beads still appear clumpy, continue pipette mixing until fully resuspended.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"tno9","text":"Remove from the magnet. Immediately add 17.5 µl Elution Solution I.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5jd3o","text":"Centrifuge briefly. Remove remaining ethanol. Air dry for 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8fcpj","text":"Remove the ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9r0df","text":"Add 200 µl 80% ethanol to pellet. Wait 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fp6dd","text":"Remove the ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"187ac","text":"Add 300 µl 80% ethanol to the pellet while on the magnet. Wait 30 sec.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"87ugi","text":"Remove the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1lhnl","text":"At the end of 10 min incubation, place on a on a 96-well plate magnet until the solution clears.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7r4qp","text":"Prepare Elution Solution I(1960ul Buffer EB; 20ul 10% Tween 20 and 20ul Reducing Agent B(2000087)). Vortex and centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"768qf","text":"Incubate 10 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39omd","text":"Pure the samples with 16ul Dynabeads Cleanup Mix(40ul Nuclease-free Water; 1465ul Cleanup Buffer(2000088); 64ul Dynabeads MyOne SILANE(2000048) and 40ul Reducing Agent B(2000087), vortex for 15 sec to mix thoroughly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5bav4","text":"Add 6ul EB.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9s8m1","text":"Incubate 85˚C for 5min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fftve","text":"Add 150ul PBS to the remaining aqueous phase, mix well then dispense the liquid evenly into 96-well plate, each well add 2ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ap17","text":"After brief centrifugation, the products can be stored at −80 °C for at least 2 weeks.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5u0u3","text":"Slowly remove and discard 125 µl Recovery Agent/Partitioning Oil (pink) from the bottom of the tube. DO NOT aspirate any aqueous sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1e7cj","text":"Add 125 µl Recovery Agent to each sample (post GEM-RT incubation) at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vsv2","text":"DO NOT pipette mix or vortex the biphasic mixture. Wait 2 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"984g8","text":"Cleanup – Dynabeads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6al8n","text":"cDNA index amplification","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"958nh","text":"Fragmentation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cl69b","text":"Pipette mix and centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d0ri9","text":"Fragmentation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"drhph","text":"Pipette mix and centrifuge briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: UDA-5'RNA-protocol
